string-array.name: fruit_description
string-array.item: PEAR - contains high levels of antioxidants, including vitamin C, vitamin K, and copper.
MANGO - is rich in vit A, C, E and folate
KIWI - has full of nutrients like vitamin C, vitamin K, vitamin E, folate, and potassium.
DRAGON FRUIT - is rich in vitamin C, B1, B2 and B3, and minerals such as iron, calcium, and phosphorus.
APPLE - are a good source of several vitamins and minerals, especially potassium, vitamin B6, and vitamin C.
BANANA - is a good source of fiber, including both soluble and insoluble pectins, and it is also a good source of vitamin C.
WATERMELON - juicy bite has significant levels of vitamins A, B6 and C, lots of lycopene, antioxidants and amino acids.
BLUEBERRIES - contain copper, beta-carotene, folate, choline, vitamins A and E, and manganese.
ORANGES - In addition to vitamin C, oranges contain fiber, potassium and choline, all of which are good for your heart.
